name: tipc
description: A wrapper around websockets which allows using a mapped type as a contract. As long as the server and client shares this contract types, neither can send nor receive incorrect typed data.

scripts.example:electron: cd example-electron && npm install && npm run build && npm run start
scripts.example:browser: cd example-browser && npm install && npm run build && npm run start
scripts.compile: rm -rf dist && npm run compile:cjs && npm run compile:mjs && npm run compile:umd && ./fixup.sh
scripts.publish: npm version patch && npm run compile && npm publish
